title: From the Ground Up: Esra Tromp on Building an EF Education-Cannondale Team That Wants to Disrupt
content:
The Dutch former rider joined the American squad this year after leaving Jumbo-Visma and wants her team to race aggressively in 2024.

Read the full article at From the Ground Up: Esra Tromp on Building an EF Education-Cannondale Team That Wants to Disrupt on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
